hibernate-mapping.query: select distinct new formatfiledto ( fm.FormatType, fm.FormatName, fm.FormatStatus ) from GLMORM00001 as fm where fm.FormatStatus = :formatstatus and fm.Active = true order by fm.FormatType
select new formatfiledto ( fm.Id, fm.FormatType, fm.FormatName ) from GLMORM00001 as fm where fm.FormatType = :formatType and fm.FormatStatus = :formatStatus and fm.Active = true
Delete from GLMORM00001 as fm where fm.FormatStatus =: formatStatus and fm.FormatType =: formatType and fm.Active = true

select new formatfiledto ( fm.Id, fm.FormatType, fm.FormatName, fm.LineNo, fm.ACode, fm.DCode, fm.Description, fm.AccountRange1, fm.AccountRange2, fm.LineRange1, fm.LineRange2, fm.Other, fm.Status, fm.ShowHide, fm.AmountTotal, fm.FormatStatus, fm.Normal ) from GLMORM00001 as fm where fm.FormatStatus = :formatStatus and fm.Active = true

Update GLMORM00001 as fm set fm.FormatName = :formatName, fm.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate, fm.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId where fm.FormatStatus =: formatStatus and fm.FormatType = :formatType and fm.Active = true

select new formatfiledto ( fm.Id, fm.TS, fm.FormatType, fm.FormatName, fm.LineNo, fm.ACode, fm.DCode, fm.Description, fm.AccountRange1, fm.AccountRange2, fm.LineRange1, fm.LineRange2, fm.Other, fm.Status, fm.ShowHide, fm.AmountTotal, fm.FormatStatus, fm.Normal, fm.UId, fm.Active, fm.CreatedDate, fm.CreatedUserId, fm.UpdatedDate, fm.UpdatedUserId ) from GLMORM00001 as fm where fm.FormatType= :formatType and fm.FormatStatus = :formatStatus and fm.ACode != '' and fm.DCode != '' and fm.Active = true order by fm.LineNo

Delete from GLMORM00001 as fm where fm.FormatStatus =: formatStatus and fm.FormatType =: formatType and fm.FormatName =: formatName and fm.LineNo = :lineNo and (fm.ACode = :aCode or fm.ACode = '') and (fm.DCode = :dCode or fm.DCode = '') and (fm.ShowHide = :showHide or fm.ShowHide = 'N') and (fm.AmountTotal = :amountTotal or fm.AmountTotal = 'Y') and (fm.Other = :other or fm.Other = '') and fm.Active = true

select new formatfiledto (fm.LineNo, fm.ACode, fm.DCode, fm.Description, fm.ShowHide, fm.AmountTotal, fm.Status) from GLMORM00001 as fm where fm.FormatType = :formatType and fm.FormatStatus = :formatStatus and fm.Active=true order by fm.LineNo

select new formatfiledto ( fm.Id, fm.TS, fm.FormatType, fm.FormatName, fm.LineNo, fm.ACode, fm.DCode, fm.Description, fm.AccountRange1, fm.AccountRange2, fm.LineRange1, fm.LineRange2, fm.Other, fm.Status, fm.ShowHide, fm.AmountTotal, fm.FormatStatus, fm.Normal, fm.UId, fm.Active, fm.CreatedDate, fm.CreatedUserId, fm.UpdatedDate, fm.UpdatedUserId ) from GLMORM00001 as fm where fm.FormatType = :formatType and fm.FormatStatus = :formatStatus and fm.Status = :status and fm.Active=true order by fm.LineNo
